body_html:
#7118

We were able to get TensorFlow build on RHEL6. Looks like you need to make some local changes, but things seem to build fine. I will close this issue to merge the discussion on the other thread, which currently has a solution.

body:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/7118

We were able to get TensorFlow build on RHEL6. Looks like you need to make some local changes, but things seem to build fine. I will close this issue to merge the discussion on the other thread, which currently has a solution.
